_header: Love I desire and love me beguile
Subjects: Christ, love of; love, of Christ
_description: A Description of Christ’s Love — seven couplets

CamStJohn37.First Lines:
Loue I desyre & loue me be gyleLoue sesyth stryue loue lesyt my
                    lyue…
CamStJohn37.Last Lines:
…Preue ȝour ♥ in sqwyche degreThat in ȝow
                    [four dots in square] stedefast ȝe be
